entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of rain, and amounts may exceed warning criteria in localised areas. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed coastal places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Starting time now earlier by four hours.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Westerly winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms and localised downpours possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with possible thunderstorms and localised downpours. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade changed to low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
